publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-171 Bill Wilson: African Aid by Strathclyde Police and Glasgow the Caring City—That the Parliament notes Strathclyde Police’s donation of equipment seized from cannabis growers, under the aegis of Operation League, to the charity, Glasgow the Caring City; additionally notes the support given to poor farmers and others in central Africa by Glasgow the Caring City, and commends these bodies for their exemplary humanitarian actions and for the service they have done to the international reputations of Strathclyde and Scotland.
S3M-171 African Aid by Strathclyde Police and Glasgow the Caring City (lodged on 12 June 2007) Michael Matheson*

S3M-171 Bill Wilson: African Aid by Strathclyde Police and Glasgow the Caring City—That the Parliament notes Strathclyde Police’s donation of equipment seized from cannabis growers, under the aegis of Operation League, to the charity, Glasgow the Caring City; additionally notes the support given to poor farmers and others in central Africa by Glasgow the Caring City, and commends these bodies for their exemplary humanitarian actions and for the service they have done to the international reputations of Strathclyde and Scotland. Supported by: Michael Matheson
S3M-171 African Aid by Strathclyde Police and Glasgow the Caring City (lodged on 12 June 2007) Sandra White*
